statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 22 \\ -14 \\ 32 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -19 \\ 13 \\ -29 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -30 \\ 41 \\ -27 \\ 61 \\ -23 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
